name: Glimmering Cave
description:
A short underground-themed platformer game about a cute little slime traveling through a cave filled with precious jewels and rocks.

Many a story tells of the treasures deep within the Glittering Cave. Valuable stones and gems line the walls and fill the earth above and below. For any other slime creature, the Glittering Cave would make a nice place to settle down and live a mostly sedentary life. This particular slime, however, is more driven to explore the cave.

It does not remember where it goes. It does not remember why it goes. All the slime knows is that it must keep going.

Instructions:
Arrow Keys: Move
Space: Jump
Repeatedly Press Space near Object: Wall-jump
